revised_title: Asymptotic Error Expansions in Numerical Analysis of Partial Differential Equations
tldr: This article discusses recent applications of asymptotic error expansions to finite-difference schemes for solving partial differential equations. It covers topics such as linear multistep methods, extrapolation procedures, and deferred corrections. The author presents various techniques for increasing the rate of convergence and improving the accuracy of finite-difference approximations to elliptic problems with smooth solutions.
